Class Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline
All Implemented Interfaces:
PosterPipeline
public final class Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline extends Object implements PosterPipeline
Kafka-backed poster pipeline that consumes TN3270 message pairs and renders poster reports.

Implements the infrastructure side of PosterPipeline for TN3270. Instances are not thread-safe; run one pipeline per CLI execution.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

    • Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline

      public Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline(String bootstrapServers)
      Creates a poster pipeline that consumes TN3270 pair records from Kafka.
      Parameters:
      bootstrapServers - comma-separated Kafka bootstrap servers
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if bootstrapServers is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if bootstrapServers is blank
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

      Since:

    • process

      public void process(PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig config, PosterConfig.DecodeMode decodeMode, PosterOutputPort outputPort) throws Exception
      Streams Kafka records and emits formatted TN3270 poster reports via the supplied output port.
      Specified by:
      process in interface PosterPipeline
      Parameters:
      config - per-protocol configuration; must provide the Kafka input topic
      decodeMode - decode mode controlling payload processing
      outputPort - destination for rendered poster reports
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if config or outputPort is null
      Exception - if Kafka consumption or report rendering fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
      Implementation Note:
      Polls Kafka in 500 ms intervals and stops after several idle polls or interrupt.
